text: 3.18 Kis 16.7, 24.17, Lom 8.29, 1 Ko 13.12, 15.49, 1 Ti 1.11 Chɨnop mɨdupsek, tap olap jomulɨk ma yu gup. Anɨb ak tek Bɨawl mɨlek ne ak chɨnop pakek, okok mɨdupsek amek chɨn nopun. Mɨnek mɨnek Bɨawl mɨlek ne anɨb ak kuŋay nep don, nab chɨnop okyaŋ gek yɨm jɨkek, Bɨawl ne mɨdeb tek mɨdobun. Bɨawl ak, ne God Kawnan ak mɨdeb ak, ne tap anɨb okok gup.
